titleStmt.title: A sermon preacht at the Cathedral Church in Norwich, upon the 11th of April, 1696, the day of His Majesties coronation / by Henry Meriton ...
titleStmt.author: Meriton, Henry, d. 1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W. Battersby ... and John Place ...,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached on the coronation day.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
